Translations.Text: yaayyuha l-nabiyu qul li-azwajika in kuntunna turid'na l-hayata l-dun'ya wazinataha fataʿalayna umattiʿ'kunna wa-usarrih'kunna sarahan jamilan
wa-in kuntunna turid'na l-laha warasulahu wal-dara l-akhirata fa-inna l-laha aʿadda lil'muh'sinati minkunna ajran ʿaziman
yanisaa l-nabiyi man yati minkunna bifahishatin mubayyinatin yudaʿaf laha l-ʿadhabu diʿ'fayni wakana dhalika ʿala l-lahi yasiran
waman yaqnut minkunna lillahi warasulihi wataʿmal salihan nu'tiha ajraha marratayni wa-aʿtadna laha riz'qan kariman
yanisaa l-nabiyi lastunna ka-ahadin mina l-nisai ini ittaqaytunna fala takhdaʿna bil-qawli fayatmaʿa alladhi fi qalbihi maradun waqul'na qawlan maʿrufan

waqarna fi buyutikunna wala tabarrajna tabarruja l-jahiliyati l-ula wa-aqim'na l-salata waatina l-zakata wa-atiʿ'na l-laha warasulahu innama yuridu l-lahu liyudh'hiba ʿankumu l-rij'sa ahla l-bayti wayutahhirakum tathiran
wa-udh'kur'na ma yut'la fi buyutikunna min ayati l-lahi wal-hik'mati inna l-laha kana latifan khabiran
